A free and open source code snippets manager for developers


massCode v4 is here ðŸš€
Weâ€™re excited to announce the release of massCode v4 â€” a major milestone that brings a brand-new foundation, improved performance, and a powerful set of tools for developers.
This version is not just an update â€” the app has been rebuilt from the ground up with a modern stack, a new database engine, and a set of utilities designed to supercharge your workflow.
Key Changes
Modern Tech Stack
The entire application has been rewritten using:
- Tailwind CSS 4.0 â€” utility-first styling
- Better SQLite3 â€” high-performance database
- Elysia.js â€” lightweight and efficient REST API framework
Migration to SQLite
Snippets are now stored in SQLite instead of JSON files, bringing:
- Faster performance with large datasets
- Atomic operations and transactions
- More reliable data storage
- Efficient searching and filtering
Developer Tools
massCode v4 ships with a new suite of built-in utilities:
- Text Tools: Case Converter, Slug Generator, URL Parser
- Crypto & Security: Hash/HMAC, Password Generator, UUID
- Encoders/Decoders: URL, Base64, JSON â‡„ TOML/XML/YAML, Text â‡„ ASCII/Binary/Unicode, Color Converter
Your feedback is welcome â€” open an issue, suggest a feature, or contribute to the project!
